result.arabic_text: وَأَتۡبَعۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعۡنَةٗۖ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمَقۡبُوحِينَ
result.translation: Firawuni hamwe n’ingabo ziwe bamaze gusomeshwa nturi, Twabakurikije ivumwe kw’isi, no ku musi w’izuka bazoba bari mu bantu baranzwe n’ibikorwa bibi cane, badakwiye kugirirwa impuhwe namba.
